document.heading: Inspector General Qualifications Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-237, the “Inspector General Qualifications Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-951. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 2, 2014, and Dec. 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 6, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-562 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-237 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
